minecraft.name: Minecraft Server
minecraft.description:
A popular sandbox game server.
Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Create, explore, survive, repeat.

spigot.name: Spigot
spigot.description:
A high-performance fork of the Minecraft server software.
Spigot is designed to be faster and more efficient than the vanilla server.

paper.name: Paper
paper.description:
A high-performance fork of Spigot.
Paper offers more features and optimizations for your Minecraft server.

forge.name: Forge
forge.description:
A modding platform for Minecraft.
Forge allows you to install and run mods on your Minecraft server.

vps_ubuntu.name: Ubuntu VPS
vps_ubuntu.description:
A virtual private server running Ubuntu.
Get full control over your server with root access.

lamp.name: LAMP Stack
lamp.description:
A software stack for web development.
LAMP stands for Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP.

docker.name: Docker
docker.description:
A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.
Docker allows you to package your applications with all their dependencies.

web_server.name: Web Hosting
web_server.description:
A web hosting service.
Host your website with us and enjoy fast and reliable service.

wordpress.name: WordPress
wordpress.description:
A popular content management system.
Create and manage your website with WordPress.

laravel.name: Laravel
laravel.description:
A PHP framework for web artisans.
Build modern web applications with Laravel.

voice_server.name: Voice Server
voice_server.description:
A voice communication server.
Connect with friends and teammates using our voice server.
